concept.title: Recreational Sports at Virginia Tech
concept.shortdesc: Recreational Sports at Virginia Tech offers a multitude of opportunites for students, faculty, and staff. Rec Sports offers group exercise, personal training, intramural sports, club sports, Venture Out, and so much more! Through Rec Sports, you can develop healthy lifestyles, friendships, and leadership skills through fun and competitive activity.

conbody.p: Recreational Sports is a department that falls directly under the Division of Student Affairs. Each and every day, employees work to promote and postively increase the quality of life for everyone in the community. There are many different factors that Rec Sports focuses on that promote the vision of a healthy lifestyle. Community outreach, cooking programs, and leadership opportunities are also incorportated.
This website will provide all of the necessary information about Recreational Sports at Virginia Tech. It is a tool that will help anyone find anything about this department!
